articles.description: Follow live text commentary from the Championship as Sheffield Wednesday and Southampton get the 2023-24 season under way.
articles.title: Championship: Sheff Wed v Southampton as English club football returns

articles.description: Bayern Munich tell Tottenham they want a decision on whether they are prepared to sell Harry Kane by the end of Friday.
articles.title: Bayern give Tottenham Friday Kane deadline

articles.description: Follow text and radio commentary as Southern Brave host Welsh Fire in the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred: Southern Brave v Welsh Fire - radio & text

articles.description: Watch live coverage from the second day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: The Commonwealth Games is in crisis - seeking hosts for the 2026 and 2030 editions after Victoria and Alberta's withdrawals. So what happens next?
articles.title: Will there be another Commonwealth Games?

articles.description: Watch Sportscene coverage and follow text updates as Arbroath host relegated Dundee United in the Scottish Championship season opener.
articles.title: Scottish Championship: Arbroath host relegated Dundee Utd

articles.description: Welsh Fire bowler Roelof van der Merwe clean bowls Southern Brave's Leus du Plooy through his legs in The Hundred at the Ageas Bowl.
articles.title: 'It's gone through his legs' - Van der Merwe removes Du Plooy

articles.description: Welsh Fire only narrowly beat Southern Brave at the Ageas Bowl despite scoring the second highest score in tournament history.
articles.title: Fire beat Brave in high-scoring Hundred thriller

articles.description: Great Britain win three golds and three silvers in a thrilling start to Friday's evening session at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: GB win three golds and three silvers at Worlds

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentary as Castleford Tigers take on Huddersfield Giants, Warrington Wolves play Catalan Dragons and Wigan Warriors face Hull KR in the Super League.
articles.title: Listen: Super League: Castleford v Huddersfield, Warrington v Catalans & Wigan v Hull KR
